Text:
phatwarez, you are legendary for your nfl uploads. Absolutely amazing. However, nearly all of them jerk a little - is this because I have my VLC set wrong or gfx card isn't enough or whatever?

Cheers, keep up the awesome work.
so is it the 30fps that causes the jutter?  it is kind of headache inducing
No. If you want a more complex explanation, email me.
